text: The women's triple jump event at the 1990 European Athletics Indoor Championships was held in Kelvin Hall on 3 March.Results (p. 533) This was the first time that this event was held at a major international competition. ==Results== {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !! Name !! Nationality !! Result !! title: 1990 European Athletics Indoor Championships – Women's triple jump
